rules_text:
Menace
Whenever an artifact enters under your control for the first time each turn, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
As long as you have ten or more {V}, change the text of Equipment you control by replacing each instance of “equipped creature” with “each creature you control.”
notes:
added nonland to the bottom ability

5.16.23 changed research trigger to distinguish it from Superconductor. Now you need to attack with all your creatures.
